org.apache.river.qa.harness

Interface OverrideProvider

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DiscardWaitOverrideProvider, MulticastOverrideProvider, ServiceLeaseOverrideProvider, StoreOverrideProvider

    public interface OverrideProvider
extends Serializable
    A provider of configuration override strings to be passed in the argument list when a service is started. An OverrideProvider can be established by a test by calling the addOverrideProvider method on the QAConfig object. Admins call the corresponding getOverrideProvider method during construction of the argument list.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String[] getOverrides(QAConfig config, String serviceName, int index)
      Provide the overrides to pass when obtaining a Configuration from a configuration provider.

    • Method Detail

      • getOverrides

        String[] getOverrides(QAConfig config,
                      String serviceName,
                      int index)
               throws TestException
        Provide the overrides to pass when obtaining a Configuration from a configuration provider. The serviceName and instance count are passed when the override is to apply to a service; for a test override, serviceName must be null and the instance count is ignored. The overrides are provided as pairs in the returned string array. The first element of the pair is the fully qualified entry name, and the second is the entry value. The '=' character is omitted.
        Parameters:
        config - the test config object
        serviceName - the service name, or null for a test override
        index - the instance count for the service
        Returns:
        the array of override strings, which must not be null, but may be of length 0
        Throws:
        TestException - if a fatal error occurs
